description.value:
Access You're from Alkenstar or the Mana Wastes.

You infuse your handwraps with black powder. On your first melee Strike each round with an unarmed attack, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Knuckle Duster]{Knuckle Duster}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Black Powder Knuckle Dusters]{Black Powder Knuckle Dusters}, you deal an additional 1 fire Damage. If you critically succeed at an attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Shove]{Shove} while in this stance, the target is pushed back an additional 5 feet.

source.value: Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powder Keg
